title: Analytics - ErgoDocs
summary: For on-chain metrics such as P2PK count, you can refer to ergo.watch. If you wish to be included on defillama.com/chain/Ergo, it is necessary to create an adaptor. To have your contributions recognized in the yearly report by developerreport.com and the weekly-updated Artemis dashboard, please add your GitHub organization or repositories to this repository.
